tool_description:
Translate API, Translation Service.
✓ Text, JSON, HTML
✓ Pay per requests, Affordable Price
✓ High-Quality Results, Blazing Speed, Reliability, Availability
✓ 110+ Languages Supported.
title: AIbit translator

api_list.name: Detect language
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aibit-translator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/translator/detect-language"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aibit-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you detect the language of this text?
What language is this text written in?
Identify the language of the following text.
Please detect the language for this text.
Determine the language of this text.
Could you tell me the language of this text?
Find out the language of this text.
What is the language of this text?
Detect the language of this text for me.
Can you identify the language of this text?

api_list.name: Get Supported Languages
api_list.description: Get list support languages by AIbit
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aibit-translator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/translator/support-languages"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aibit-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What languages does AIbit translator support?
Can you list all the languages supported by AIbit translator?
Show me the languages available for translation with AIbit.
Which languages can I translate using AIbit translator?
Provide a list of languages that AIbit translator can handle.
What are the supported languages in AIbit translation service?
Could you give me the list of languages supported by AIbit?
Tell me all the languages that AIbit translator supports.
What are the available languages for translation in AIbit?
List the languages that AIbit translator can translate.

api_list.name: Translate JSON
api_list.description: - Translate JSON data, able to protect paths

parameters.name: json
parameters.default: {         "title": "The Importance of Regular Exercise",         "author": "John Doe",         "rate": 4.2999,         "extra": {             "comment_counts": 10,             "last_comment": {                 "author": "not be translated",                 "short_text": "Hi thank for your post... We need more information"             }         }     }

utterances.utterance: Translate the JSON data from English to Vietnamese, ensuring the author's name in the last comment is not translated.

api_list.name: Detect language
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aibit-translator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/translator/detect-language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aibit-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aibit-translator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/translator/detect-language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aibit-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you detect the language of this text?
